pr_title: Add Wikipedia Banner in search for free app version

timeline.message:
Add Wikipedia Banner in search for free app version
Add "Download Wikipedia maps" in search when no results and wiki maps for region available
Show wikipedia articles in chosen language

timeline.bodyText: Static method and only used in different class? Doesn't look good
timeline.author: vshcherb

timeline.message: add icon and name to WikipediaPlugin
Move check in Search to Wikipedia Plugin

timeline.bodyText: We need to do it via OsmAndPlugin.prepareExtraTopPoiFilters and there specify all what we need for this feature.
timeline.author: vshcherb
